node.title: Jen's teenage son has tried to end his life three times. She says the lack of regional youth mental health care is at 'crisis point'
node.alt: A woman looks thoughtfully at the camera
node.description: Regional Victorian childrenÂ are in critical need of specialist mental health care services. More care has been promised, but desperate parents fear it will be too little, too late.
node.content:
["It was the third time in 12 months that Jen's 15-year-old son had attempted suicide.", "As he was lying in his Melbourne hospital bed with a hopeless look in his eyes, she wondered for the hundredth time if things could have been different.", "Zac had first raised the alarm in October last year, admitting he wasn't coping.", "But it was three months before they could access youth mental health service headspace. Then,\u00a0after he was discharged after four sessions, his mental health began to spiral downwards again.", "It was another four months before they managed to access a psychiatrist.", "", "
The\u00a0Youth Prevention and Recovery Care (YPARC) facilities aim to provide sub-acute care to young people.(Supplied)
", "Today, the Shepparton mum lives on high alert for any risks to Zac's life.", "She and her husband have removed all\u00a0sharp objects from the house,\u00a0locking doors\u00a0and sleeping on opposite sides of the home in case their son tries to slip out at night and harm himself.", "On the most exhausting days, Jen\u00a0wonders\u00a0if things would look different today if her son had received mental health support immediately after reaching out for help.", "\"There's so many vulnerable kids out there, especially because of COVID,\" she said.", "
More mental health care promised
", "Many regional Victorian parents\u00a0feel like their children have to reach crisis point before they can\u00a0receive mental health care, as chronic shortages in the sector spark lengthy waitlists.", "To address this, the Victorian Government has just pledged new 10-bed residential Youth Prevention and Recovery Care (YPARC) facilities for Shepparton, Ballarat, Geelong, Traralgon and Heidelberg.", "The short-term service will treat young people for sub-acute presentations, and aims to prevent avoidable admissions to acute\u00a0units.", "Victoria's mental health royal commission has recommended every region be equipped with these YPARC services, after revealing a stark shortfall in mental health care for young people.", "It is\u00a0estimated that in 2019-20, more than 1.1 million hours of specialist mental health care were\u00a0required for people aged 12 to 25.", "Just a third of those hours were met by public mental health services.", "", "
Jen feels more services are needed to support regional young people's mental health.(Supplied)
", "
Parents fear facilities are 'not enough'
", "While these YPARC facilities will offer some relief for stretched\u00a0regional hospitals \u2014\u00a0many parents, like Jen, fear it will not enough.", "The facilities are due to open in late 2023, so there is still a long wait before they are available.", "And they will only cater for\u00a0young people aged 16 to 25.", "\"So what happens to those kids who are 12 to 15?\" Jen asked.", "Sally Thomas, manager at Goulburn Valley Health's Child and Adolescent Mental Health Service (CAMHS) in Shepparton, said\u00a0while there would still be gaps in care locally, the YPARC would\u00a0help.", "\"If we're able to admit [young people] earlier, without needing to wait until they get to that complex, high-risk stage, then the need for those high-risk beds will be less,\" she said.", "", "
Ballarat\u00a0Damascus College well-being staff Claudia Griffin and Andy Robertson say school services have been expanded to meet the growing demand from students.(Supplied: Damascus College Ballarat)
", "
School\u00a0counsellors booked out
", "Ballarat-based Damascus College fears the YPARC will not offer early enough intervention for regional youth.", "Andy Robertson, the school's\u00a0assistant principal, student well-being,\u00a0said a \"significant percentage\" of students was\u00a0struggling with mental health issues.", "After parent feedback reported six-month wait times for psychologists in the region, the school expanded its support services.", "But Mr Robertson\u00a0said even with \"two-and-a-half\" school counsellors\u00a0and two psychologists working two days each per week, demand remained\u00a0high.", "He worried the new beds in Ballarat might come too late for some youth.", "\"The news is amazing, but we're still very aware of a new approach to mental health,\" he said.", "
Regional staff shortages
", "Meanwhile Ballarat psychologist and Victorian chair of the Australian Psychology Association, Jacqui White, voiced her concerns about how\u00a0the program would find workers.", "", "
Ms White says she is unsure how the government will staff the new YPARCS program.(Supplied: Clear Thinking Mental Health Group)
", "\"In the Grampians we already struggle to have staff for the beds we've got, so if we get another 10 beds, we can't pluck more staff because this is trained specialist staff.\"", "One of the findings from the royal commission was that regional Victoria had\u00a0a significant shortage of mental health workers.", "Ms White said minimal university spots and study opportunities through to limited mentors left the industry high and dry.", "But even when people were trained, there was the problem of\u00a0keeping them in regional Victoria.", "\"Lots of people want to go and work closer to the city, and this is across all different professions \u2026\u00a0we find it difficult to keep staff in regional \u2014 and definitely rural \u2014 areas,\" she said.", "
Struggle to access care
", "It's a shortage impacting young people like Zac\u00a0firsthand.", "In the past year, he has been admitted to Box Hill Hospital six times for critical care that he cannot\u00a0access in his hometown.", "But there are just 12 beds in the hospital's Acute Adolescent Psychiatric Inpatient Care unit \u2014\u00a0and only two of those for high-risk people like Zac.", "", "
Jen is calling for more help for regional young people struggling with mental health issues.(Supplied)
", "It is a similar story statewide.", "Meanwhile, Victoria's growing epidemic of youth mental illness shows no signs of slowing.", "\"The other day, we had to call the police on Zac,\" Jen said.", "\"It's at crisis point.\""]
